bioconda.name: bioconductor-affycomp
bioconda.summary: Graphics Toolbox for Assessment of Affymetrix Expression Measures

biotools.summary: The package contains functions that can be used to compare expression measures for Affymetrix Oligonucleotide Arrays.

bioschemas.summary: The package contains functions that can be used to compare expression measures for Affymetrix Oligonucleotide Arrays.
